nodes.text: The Mneon system, also known as the Geran system, was a star system located in the Calaron sector of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories that contained the planet Geran, homeworld of the sentient Geranite species and flying reptiles known as shell-bats.

The Mneon system was first mentioned in "Skin Deep: The Fat Dancer's Tale," a short story written by A. C. Crispin and published in Tales from Jabba's Palace, a Star Wars Legends anthology edited by Kevin J. Anderson and released on January 2, 1996. The Essential Atlas, a reference book written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace and released on August 18, 2009, placed the system in grid square T-9.
